steps.title: Draw two parallel curve lines in the centre of the page.
steps.content: Draw two parallel curve lines in the centre of the page.

steps.title: Draw another pattern of the curve lines to the left and right.
steps.content: Draw another pattern of the curve lines to the left and right.

steps.title: Draw a different pattern on the right but use the same principle and about the same width as the others.
steps.content: Draw a different pattern on the right but use the same principle and about the same width as the others.

steps.title: Draw other curves on the far right with about the same width as the others.
steps.content: Draw other curves on the far right with about the same width as the others.

steps.title: Draw other curves on the left following the same structure or width but with different curvatures.
steps.content: Draw other curves on the left following the same structure or width but with different curvatures.

steps.title: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary sketches.
steps.content: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary sketches. Emphasize the stripes using a black or any bold color.

steps.title: Refine and enhance the color to your liking!
steps.content: Refine and enhance the color to your liking!

steps.title: Add more lines but this time add one more small oval.
steps.content: Add more lines but this time add one more small oval.

steps.title: Note, you now have the design you need.
steps.content: Note, you now have the design you need.

steps.title: Take one black colored pencil and enjoy yourself while making the zebra stripes.
steps.content: Take one black colored pencil and enjoy yourself while making the zebra stripes.
